perturbation.original_text:
12.2. EXCEPT FOR AMOUNTS PAYABLE TO THIRD PARTIES IN CONNECTION WITH CLAIMS SUBJECT TO THE
INDEMNIFICATION PROVISIONS OF SECTION 9.1 OR A BREACH OF EITHER PARTY’S OBLIGATIONS UNDER SECTION 5
(CONFIDENTIALITY), NEITHER PARTY WILL, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, BE LIABLE TO THE OTHER PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS
OR ANY OTHER SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT EVEN IF
THE PARTY HAS BEEN NOTIFIED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
perturbation.changed_text:
14.4 Further Documents. The parties agree to execute and deliver all such further documents, agreements and instruments and take such
other and further action as may be necessary or appropriate to carry out the purposes and intent of this Agreement. EXCEPT FOR AMOUNTS PAYABLE TO THIRD PARTIES IN CONNECTION WITH CLAIMS SUBJECT TO THE
INDEMNIFICATION PROVISIONS OF SECTION 9.1 OR A BREACH OF EITHER PARTY’S OBLIGATIONS UNDER SECTION 5
(CONFIDENTIALITY), NEITHER PARTY WILL, UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES, BE LIABLE TO THE OTHER PARTY FOR ANY LOST PROFITS
OR ANY OTHER SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT EVEN IF
THE PARTY HAS BEEN NOTIFIED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the clause limiting liability for lost profits and consequential damages from the indemnification section to the 'Further Documents' section makes it less prominent and more difficult to find. This section is about the execution of documents, not the limitation of liability, making the placement illogical and potentially weakening its enforceability.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Consequential Damage Waivers

perturbation.original_text:
9.6 T&B ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT NO REPRESENTATIONS OR STATEMENTS OF ACTUAL, AVERAGE, PROJECTED OR
FORECASTED SALES, PROFITS, ROYALTIES, OR EARNINGS HAVE BEEN MADE WITH RESPECT TO THE BUSINESS CONTEMPLATED BY
THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.changed_text:
14.5 Entire Agreement. This Agreement, along with any attachments, exhibits, schedules and documents specifically referenced herein,
constitutes the entire agreement between the parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes all prior communications,
writings and other documents with regard thereto. No modification, amendment or waiver of any provision hereof shall be binding upon either party
hereto unless it is in writing and executed by both of the parties hereto or, in the case of a waiver, by the party waiving compliance. T&B ACKNOWLEDGES AND AGREES THAT NO REPRESENTATIONS OR STATEMENTS OF ACTUAL, AVERAGE, PROJECTED OR
FORECASTED SALES, PROFITS, ROYALTIES, OR EARNINGS HAVE BEEN MADE WITH RESPECT TO THE BUSINESS CONTEMPLATED BY
THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the clause disclaiming representations about sales projections from the royalties section to the 'Entire Agreement' section buries it within boilerplate language. This section is about what the whole agreement comprises and does not naturally deal with revenue projections or financial considerations, making it more difficult to locate and potentially enforce the disclaimer effectively.

perturbation.original_text:
14.10 Governing Law. This Agreement will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York without
regard to its provisions concerning the applicability of the laws of other jurisdictions, and specifically excluding the United Nations Convention on
the International Sale of Goods.
perturbation.changed_text:
3.5 LEA acknowledges and agrees that, except as otherwise specifically provided for herein, this Agreement grants LEA no title or right of
ownership in or to the Licensed Intellectual Property. LEA shall not at any time do or cause to be done any act, omission, or thing contesting or in
any way impairing or tending to impair any part of T&B’s right, title and interest in the Licensed Intellectual Property. Governing Law. This Agreement will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of New York without
regard to its provisions concerning the applicability of the laws of other jurisdictions, and specifically excluding the United Nations Convention on
the International Sale of Goods.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the clause about Governing Law to the Licensed Intellectual Property, it is placed in an irrelevant section of the contract, potentially making it difficult to locate and enforce. This section now discusses the ownership of Licensed Intellectual Property and the governing law that oversees the contract.
